text: "Alright" is a 1997 song by English funk band Jamiroquai and is the fourth single from their third studio album Travelling Without Moving. It went to number 6 in the United Kingdom and Italy, number 8 in Scotland, number 78 in the United States, number 84 in Australia, number 13 in Finland and number 2 in Iceland. ==Track listings== * UK CD1 # "Alright" (radio edit) – 3:40 # "Alright" (version – vocal) – 6:04 # "Alright" (dub – vocal) – 5:34 # "Alright" (D.J. – Version Excursion) – 6:47 * UK CD2 # "Alright" (full-length version) – 4:23 # "Alright" (Tee's in House Mix) – 7:20 # "Alright" (Tee's Digital Club) – 7:15 # "Alright" (Tee's Radio Jay) – 3:27 * 2006 digital EP # "Alright" (Fred Falke & Alan Braxe Remix) – 6:10 # "Alright" (Todd Terry's in House Remix) – 7:20 ==References== Category:1997 songs Category:Jamiroquai songs Category:Disco songs
title: Alright (Jamiroquai song)
